Melee Weapon Attack:
 +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage. If the target
is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or lose 5 (1d10) hit points at the start of
each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5
(1d10). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target
receives magical healing.
The devil makes two attacks: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.
The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
The devil can't be frightened while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.
